Auth"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":"When you're running an AI agent dashboard locally and need to expose it to the internet, security becomes paramount. This guide covers best practices for securing your OpenClaw dashboard."}],"\n",["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl font-bold text-white mt-8 mb-4","children":"Why Security Matters"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":"AI agent dashboards often have access to:"}],"\n",["$","ul",null,{"className":"list-disc list-inside text-gray-300 mb-4 space-y-2","children":["\n",["$","li","li-0",{"children":"Your local file system"}],"\n",["$","li","li-1",{"children":"Environment variables and secrets"}],"\n",["$","li","li-2",{"children":"System commands and terminal access"}],"\n",["$","li","li-3",{"children":"API keys for various services"}],"\n"]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":"Without proper security, an exposed dashboard is an open invitation for attackers."}],"\n",["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl font-bold text-white mt-8 mb-4","children":"Implementation Strategy"}],"\n",["$","h3",null,{"className":"text-xl font-bold text-white mt-6 mb-3","children":"1. API Token Authentication"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":"Generate a strong, random token for your dashboard using OpenSSL or a secure random generator. Store this token securely in your environment variables."}],"\n",["$","h3",null,{"className":"text-xl font-bold text-white mt-6 mb-3","children":"2. SSH Tunnel (Recommended)"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":"Instead of exposing directly, use an SSH tunnel. This creates a secure tunnel without opening ports on your router."}],"\n",["$","h3",null,{"className":"text-xl font-bold text-white mt-6 mb-3","children":"3. Rate Limiting"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":"Implement rate limiting to prevent brute force attacks. Limit requests per IP address and implement exponential backoff for failed attempts."}],"\n",["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl font-bold text-white mt-8 mb-4","children":"Security Checklist"}],"\n",["$","ul",null,{"className":"list-disc list-inside text-gray-300 mb-4 space-y-2","children":["\n",["$","li","li-0",{"children":"Generate strong API token"}],"\n",["$","li","li-1",{"children":"Use HTTPS only (no HTTP)"}],"\n",["$","li","li-2",{"children":"Implement rate limiting"}],"\n",["$","li","li-3",{"children":"Add request logging"}],"\n",["$","li","li-4",{"children":"Consider SSH tunnel instead of direct exposure"}],"\n",["$","li","li-5",{"children":"Regular security audits"}],"\n"]}],"\n",["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl font-bold text-white mt-8 mb-4","children":"Conclusion"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":"Security should never be an afterthought when exposing local services to the internet. Follow these practices to keep your AI agent dashboard secure."}]]}],["$","section",null,{"className":"mt-12 pt-8 border-t border-gray-700","children":[["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl font-bold text-white mb-6","children":"Related Articles"}],["$","div",null,{"className":"grid md:grid-cols-2 gap-6","children":[["$","$L2","4",{"href":"/article/security-alert-malicious-skills","className":"article-card group","children":[["$","div",null,{"className":"flex items-center space-x-2 mb-2","children":[["$","span",null,{"className":"inline-flex items-center px-2 py-0.5 rounded text-xs font-medium bg-red-500/10 text-red-400","children":"Security"}],["$","span",null,{"className":"text-xs text-gray-500","children":"Feb 5, 2026"}]]}],["$","h3",null,{"className":"text-lg font-semibold text-white group-hover:text-blue-400 transition-colors mb-2","children":"Security Alert: Malicious Skills on Public Registries"}],["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-400 text-sm line-clamp-2","children":"Prompt injection attempts found in publicly available AI agent skills.
